page.title: 08My day at Coates School
page.content:
{by Claire, aged 6:} "I got up at 7 o'clock in the morning. I got drest and I went down wen my mum got up and had my breakfast and I went to school and we went to play and wen we came in we went to the pond - all of the tables - to look at the fish."
{by Richard, aged 7:} "Yesterday at school, I started a new English book called 'Oxford Junior English'. It is a sort of sentence teacher, because it shows you pictures and at the bottom of the page are some sentences and you match them up with the pictures. Then we did some Scottish Maths, and some writing about the creatures and plants in the school pond."
